task.title: Installing the Installation Manager via GUI
task.shortdesc: Installation Manager is a common installer for many IBM software products that you use to install this version of Edge Components.

taskbody.prereq: Before you install install IBM Installation Manager make sure that Edge Components products are installed.
taskbody.context: To install via Graphical User Interface follow the steps below:

step.cmd: In the Windows installer, follow the onscreen instructions until you are asked whether to do an upgrade or custom installation. Choose Custom.
When you are asked where to install Windows, select the partition named BOOTCAMP.
Follow the onscreen instructions to finish installing and configuring Windows.
step.stepresult: After you install the software, your machine automatically restarts. Use the Windows setup screens to configure Windows.
